resources.string: Please consider using a more specific topic or increasing the minimum views.

Youwatch aims to redefine your YouTube experience by notifying you when videos about certain topics become popular. You can get started in 3 easy steps.

 1. Click the "+" button in the bottom right corner of the screen.
 2. Type in a topic you are interested in the box, and select a minimum number of views.
 3. Look at the matches found last month, and adjust the topic name and the minimum views until you find a number you are comfortable with.
